answers.answer: You'll have to see a nutritionist and they'll recommend diet and exercise.
She already prescribed me insulin. With out even taking the 4 hour test.
I would request the 3 hour test. Sometimes it can be a fluke if u don't take the longer one.
I had ice cream the night before. I don't no if that would mess it up? I didn't eat after midnight and my test was at 745am
You probably have it. I ate bacon pizza before I went to take the test and it came back normal.

question: A few days ago my doctor told me I have gestational diabetes.  Anybody have any help? Is this very serious?
title: gestational diabetes
